mapper.update: update consignee_info set name=#{name}, province=#{province} , city=#{city} ,district=#{district} , street_address=#{streetAddress} , zip_code=#{zipCode} , phone=#{phone}, telephone=#{telephone} , card_id=#{cardId} , last_date=#{lastDate} , card_url=#{cardUrl} , cardurlother=#{cardurlother} , cardurltogether=#{cardurltogether} where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from consignee_info where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
delete from consignee_info where user_id in #{id}
mapper.select: select * from consignee_info where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
select * from consignee_info where user_id=#{userId} and name like #{key} order by `consignee_info`.last_date desc limit #{index},#{size}
select count(*) from consignee_info where user_id=#{userId} and name like #{key}

select count(*) from consignee_info where user_id=#{userId} and (name like #{key} or province like #{key} or city like #{key} or district like #{key} or street_address like #{key} or phone like #{key} or telephone like #{key} or card_id like #{key} or zip_code like #{key})

select * from consignee_info where user_id=#{userId} and (name like #{key} or province like #{key} or city like #{key} or district like #{key} or street_address like #{key} or phone like #{key} or telephone like #{key} or card_id like #{key} or zip_code like #{key}) order by `consignee_info`.last_date desc limit #{index},#{size}
select count(*) from consignee_info where user_id=#{userId} and phone=#{phone}
